memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t t, int16_t b, int16_t c, uint16_t d)
memberdef.name: backEaseIn

briefdescription.para: Back easing in: Overshooting cubic easing: (s+1)*t^3 - s*t^2.

detaileddescription.para: Backtracking slightly, then reversing direction and moving to target.

parameterdescription.para: Time. The current time or step.
Beginning. The beginning value.
Change. The change between the beginning value and the destination value.
Duration. The total time or total number of steps.

simplesect.para: The current value as a function of the current time or step.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t t, int16_t b, int16_t c, uint16_t d)
memberdef.name: backEaseInOut

briefdescription.para: Back easing in/out: Overshooting cubic easing: (s+1)*t^3 - s*t^2.

detaileddescription.para: Backtracking slightly, then reversing direction and moving to target, then overshooting target, reversing, and finally coming back to target.

parameterdescription.para: Time. The current time or step.
Beginning. The beginning value.
Change. The change between the beginning value and the destination value.
Duration. The total time or total number of steps.

simplesect.para: The current value as a function of the current time or step.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t t, int16_t b, int16_t c, uint16_t d)
memberdef.name: backEaseOut

briefdescription.para: Back easing out: Overshooting cubic easing: (s+1)*t^3 - s*t^2.

detaileddescription.para: Moving towards target, overshooting it slightly, then reversing and coming back to target.

parameterdescription.para: Time. The current time or step.
Beginning. The beginning value.
Change. The change between the beginning value and the destination value.
Duration. The total time or total number of steps.

simplesect.para: The current value as a function of the current time or step.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t t, int16_t b, int16_t c, uint16_t d)
memberdef.name: bounceEaseIn

briefdescription.para: Bounce easing in - exponentially decaying parabolic bounce.

parameterdescription.para: Time. The current time or step.
Beginning. The beginning value.
Change. The change between the beginning value and the destination value.
Duration. The total time or total number of steps.

simplesect.para: The current value as a function of the current time or step.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t t, int16_t b, int16_t c, uint16_t d)

memberdef.argsstring: (float resultFloating)
memberdef.name: roundRespectSign

parameterdescription.para: The result floating.

simplesect.para: An int16_t.

briefdescription.para: Defines the "Penner easing functions", which are a de facto standard for computing aesthetically pleasing motion animations.

detaileddescription.para: See http://easings.net/ for visual illustrations of the easing equations.
